text:
Section 6(e)(l) of FLSA applies to every
employer providing any contract service (other than linen supply services)
under a contract with the United States or any subcontractor thereunder. It is
not necessary that the contract be subject to SCA.
html: Section 6(e)(l) of FLSA applies to every employer providing any contract service (other than linen supply services) under a contract with the United States or any subcontractor thereunder. It is not necessary that the contract be subject to SCA.
